page.title: 02WEST PLEAN PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: We receive our education at West Plean School from the age of five for seven years. Our school was{built in 1879 to {hold 110 pupils.}We cannot think how they managed to fit in because we scarcely have enough room for the 18 pupils who attend today. The building has hardly changed in the last hundred years, we still have to go down to the end of the playground to use the outside toilets. Our teacher is Mrs. Hamilton who has been at this school for 16 years. Our school has 2 classes and Miss Petrie teaches the younger children. Most of the children in our school have farming connections either through parents or grandparents. We like our little school because we get to know each other very well and it is like having lots of brothers and sisters.
